featured.text: But even more serious is their environmental impact: Millions of plastic discards end up in landfills or the ocean, releasing chemicals and at the same time taking centuries to decompose.
According to one research, 90% of the bottles used are not recycled and lie for ages in landfills.

definition.zh_def: 垃圾填埋場，指用於處理和儲存垃圾的地區，通常將垃圾埋入地下。
definition.en_def: A site for the disposal of waste materials by burying them.
definition.example: The city decided to expand the landfill to accommodate more waste.
